B1.ThemeDescription: The introduction of significant reforms in the national education system, aiming to modernize and make education more accessible.
B1.StuctureInstruction: The narrative structure is WideBranch, where The narrative starts with a central theme related to education, then branches out into two distinct but related educational themes, exploring different facets of the educational system. (eg. B1 -> A2; B1 -> C2). The current chapter node is B1, which is the 1th chapter node in the narrative structure.
